biography:
Karen Matheson OBE is a Scottish folk singer, who frequently sings in Scottish Gaelic. She is lead singer of the group Capercaillie and was formerly a member of Dan Ar Braz's group L'HÃ©ritage des Celtes, with whom she often sang lead vocals. 

She made a cameo appearance in the 1995 movie Rob Roy singing the song "Ailein duinn".
name: Karen Matheson
